clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Low Dosage of Terazosin in Subjects Undergoing Carotid Artery Stenting
clinical_study.official_title: A Pilot Study Assessing the Safety and Efficacy of Low Dosage of Terazosin in Subjects Undergoing Carotid Artery Stenting

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and efficacy of low dosage of Terazosin in Carotid Artery Stenting

primary_outcome.measure: Participants who got New DWI Lesions (MRI)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Within 48 hours after carotid artery stenting
primary_outcome.description: Patients who got new ischemic lesions as defined by DWI MRI within 48 hours after carotid artery stenting

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 48 hours after carotid artery stenting
secondary_outcome.description: Number of new ischemic lesions as defined by DWI MRI within 48 hours after carotid artery stenting

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 48 hours after carotid artery stenting
secondary_outcome.description: Volume of new ischemic lesions as defined by DWI MRI within 48 hours after carotid artery stenting

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with New DWI Lesions (MRI) diameter greater than 5mm
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 48 hours after carotid artery stenting
secondary_outcome.description: Patients who got new ischemic lesions diameter greater than 5mm as defined by DWI MRI within 48 hours carotid artery stenting

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Patients with Cerebrovascular Events, Cardiovascular Events or Death.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline to 1, 3, 6 and 12 months after treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Cerebrovascular events included ischemic stroke, transient ischemic attack (TIA), cerebral hemorrhage and hyperperfusion syndrome. Cardiovascular events included angina and myocardial infarction. Death included any reason caused death.

secondary_outcome.description: Any side events caused by TZ, regular treatment or CAS

arm_group.description: Treatment:Patients in this group received standard medical therapy and Terazosin (TZ) treatment. Drug: TZ 0.5mg once a day for 3-7 days before carotid artery stenting to 12 months later. Procedure: Carotid Artery Stenting
Treatment: Patients in this group received standard medical therapy alone. Procedure: Carotid Artery Stenting

intervention.description: TZ 0.5mg once a day for 3-7 days before carotid artery stenting to 12 months later.

Carotid artery stenting is an alternative treatment of carotid artery stenosis, which would be performed by experienced neuroradiologist according to the latest guideline from American Heart Association and American Stroke Association.
